data.author: Dr. Suess

data.quote: Imitation is suicide.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: I can't go back to yesterday because I was a different person then.
data.author: Lewis Carroll

data.quote: Don't go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing. It was here first.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: You don't need endless time and perfect conditions. Do it now. Do it today. Do it for 20 minutes and watch you heart start beating.
data.author: Barbara Sher

data.quote: I have never learned anything from any man who agreed with me.
data.author: Dudley Field Malone

data.quote: Those who don't believe in magic will never find it
data.author: Roald Dahl

data.quote: ‘If we challenge convention, we can solve any problem.
data.author: Josh Valman

data.quote: I would visualize things coming to me. It would just make me feel better. Visualization works if you work hard. That's the thing. You can't just visualize and go eat a sandwhich.
data.author: Jim Carrey

data.quote: ‘Excellence is not a skill. It is an attitude.
data.author: Ralph Harston

data.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
data.author: George Eliot

data.quote: If all you can do is crawl, then start crawling.
data.author: Rumi

data.quote: Don't worry about being worried. You're heading out on an adventure and you can always change your mind along the way and try something else.
data.author: Tracy Kidder

data.quote: If you are willing to do more than you are paid to do, eventually you will be paid to do more than you do.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: What would you attempt if you knew you would not fail.
data.author: Robert Schuller

data.quote: Whenever you see a successful person, you only see the public glories, never the private sacrifices to reach them.
data.author: Vaibhav Shah

data.quote: ‘I am not a product of my circumstances, I am a product of my decisions.
data.author: Stephen Covey

data.quote: The number one reason people fail in life is that they listen to their friends, family and neighbors.
data.author: Napoleon Hill

data.quote: You wouldn't worry so much about what others think about you if you realized how seldom they do.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. In order to maintain balance you must keep moving.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: No matter where life takes me, find me with a smile.
data.author: Mac Miller

data.quote: There is no mountain I cant climb. No tower too high. No plane that I can't learn how to fly.
data.author: Eminem

data.quote: If you aren't sincere with it, you shouldn't say anything at all.
data.author: Dr. Dre
